params._withdrawData: custom withdraw data; ignore if you need to withdraw on the same chain
params.deposit_: if true, deposits to YieldBox from `msg.sender`
params.withdraw_: if true, withdraws from YieldBox to `msg.sender`
if true withdraws to sender address

params.borrowPart: The amount of borrow part to convert.

returns.amount: The equivalent of borrow part in asset amount.

params._collateralAmount: the amount added to BingBang as collateral

depositAddCollateralAndBorrow(address,ui.notice: deposts collateral to YieldBox, adds collateral to Singularity, borrows and can withdraw to personal address

depositAndAddAsset(address,uint256,bool).notice: deposits asset to YieldBox and lends it to Singularity

depositAndRepay(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: deposits to YieldBox and repays borrowed amount

depositRepayAndRemoveCollateral(address,.notice: deposits to YieldBox, repays borrowed amount and removes collateral

getAmountForAssetFraction(address,uint25.notice: Compute the amount of `singularity.assetId` from `fraction` `fraction` can be `singularity.accrueInfo.feeFraction` or `singularity.balanceOf`

getAmountForBorrowPart(address,uint256).notice: Return the equivalent of borrow part in asset amount.

getCollateralAmountForShare(address,uint.notice: Calculate the collateral amount off the shares.

getCollateralSharesForBorrowPart(address.notice: Calculate the collateral shares that are needed for `borrowPart`, taking the current exchange rate into account.

mintAndLend(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: deposits asset to YieldBox, mints USD0 and lends it to Singularity
